Set-Location -Path "D:\agenic_arhitecture\Multi-service_Docker"

# overwrite requirements.txt (removes google-generative-ai line)
Set-Content -Path .\web\requirements.txt -Value @"
fastapi==0.101.0
uvicorn[standard]==0.22.0
python-dotenv==1.0.0
httpx==0.25.0
psycopg2-binary==2.9.7
requests==2.31.0
"@ -Encoding UTF8

# show new contents for verification
Get-Content .\web\requirements.txt
